titleInfo.title: Dottie West, Rex Allen, Jr., and Sunday Sharpe at Camden Park (16437)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Dottie West and Cross Country at Camden Park on August 31, and Rex Allen, Jr. and Sunday Sharpe at Camden Park on September 1. Poster features metal photoplates of Dottie West, Rex Allen, Jr., and Sunday Sharpe. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/39784/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
